title: Cruel Provocations
description: The city came to claim Therasia's lands. Can this one, half-fae hunter resist them? Only if she uncovers the truth about her own nature and powers. Will her growing feelings for one of the soldiers prove to be her salvation, or will lust a betrayal prove her downfall?In a world where electrical energy can be gathered and stored in Lightning Jars, powering mighty weapons of war, one hunter must fight tooth and claw not only to preserve her peaceful home, but to prevent a war that would slaughter thousands. But all is not well in her idyllic village. A battle is brewing among the true-fae that would end humanity. Therasia must challenge the very concepts that form core of her being.
author: D. Harrigon
